recipe.title: Green Olive and Almond Tapenade
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups brine-cured green olives (10-ounce jar), pitted
Accompaniment: carrot sticks, toasted pita wedges, or toasted baguette slices
instructions: Blend olives, parsley, almonds, and lemon juice in bowl of a food processor, scraping down side occasionally, until finely chopped. Add oil in a stream with motor running to form a paste.
